    In-memory compile Java source code as String.

      • getCompiler

        public static JavaStringCompiler getCompiler(String projectId)

      • compile

        public Map<String,byte[]> compile(String name,
                                  String source)
                           throws CompileExcetion
        Compile a Java source file in memory.
        参数:
        name - Java file name, e.g. "Test.java"
        source - The source code as String.
        返回:
        The compiled results as Map that contains class name as key, class binary as value.
        抛出:
        IOException - If compile error.
        CompileExcetion

      • multiCompile

        public Map<String,byte[]> multiCompile(List<MemoryJavaFileManager.MemoryInputJavaFileObject> sources)
                                throws CompileExcetion
        抛出:
        CompileExcetion

      • loadClass

        public Class<?> loadClass(String name,
                          Map<String,byte[]> classBytes)
                   throws ClassNotFoundException
        Load class from compiled classes.
        参数:
        name - Full class name.
        classBytes - Compiled results as a Map.
        返回:
        The Class instance.
        抛出:
        ClassNotFoundException - If class not found.

      • getClassLoader

        public MemoryClassLoader getClassLoader(Map<String,byte[]> classBytes)
                                 throws ClassNotFoundException
        get class loader
        抛出:
        ClassNotFoundException
